entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 a.m. ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 11 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: E 25 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7 except high minus 4 in the Postville area.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7 except high minus 4 in the Postville area. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
